org.cornutum.tcases.openapi

Class SchemaUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.openapi.SchemaUtils

  • public final class SchemaUtils
extends Object
    Defines methods for accessing an OpenAPI Schema object.

    • Field Summary

      • resolveSchemaType

        public static io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> resolveSchemaType(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        If necessary, updates the type of the given schema based its properties. If the type defined for this schema is valid and consistent, returns the updated schema. Otherwise, throws an exception.

      • isSchemaType

        public static boolean isSchemaType(String type)
        Returns true if the given schema type is supported by OpenAPI.

      • asComposedSchema

        public static io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.ComposedSchema asComposedSchema(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        If the given schema is a ComposedSchema instance, returns the casting result. Otherwise, returns null.

      • asArraySchema

        public static io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.ArraySchema asArraySchema(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        If the given schema is an ArraySchema instance, returns the casting result. Otherwise, returns null.

      • additionalPropertiesSchema

        public static io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> additionalPropertiesSchema(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        If the given schema asserts a schema for additional properties, returns the additional properties schema. Otherwise, returns null.

        Returns the given schema designated as an object property schema.

      • isLeafSchema

        public static boolean isLeafSchema(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        Returns true if this is a basic schema without any boolean combinations of subschemas.

      • isNotLeafSchema

        public static boolean isNotLeafSchema(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        Returns true if this schema asserts any boolean combinations of subschemas.

        Returns true if this schema contains no leaf assertions.

      • schemaExample

        public static Optional<Object> schemaExample(io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> schema)
        Returns null if no example is defined for the given schema. Otherwise, returns Optional.empty() if the schema example value is null. Otherwise, returns the schema example value.

      • combineSchemas

        public static io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> combineSchemas(OpenApiContext context,
                                                                      io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> base,
                                                                      io.swagger.v3.oas.models.media.Schema<?> additional)
        Returns a new schema that validates any instance that satisfies both the base schema and the additional schema. Throws an exception if a consistent combination is not possible.

        public static boolean isMultipleOf(BigDecimal value,

        Returns true if the given value is a multiple of the given factor.
